content.p: With state-of-the-art facilities including the Â£40m David Ross Sports Village, inclusive and disability sport provision, and the ability to host world-class events on site we have something for everyone. If you'd like to book an event, then please get in touch below. From local school events, to national and international competitions we have an outstanding portfolio of sports facilities and a wealth of experience supporting major sporting events. Get in touch and tell us about your event. +44 (0)115 748 7000 sport@nottingham.ac.uk Find our opening times here.
